title: Ticket #262: Update queue before deleting old ckpt from ckpt server
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

In the old shadow after a job has checkpointed due to being vacated we delete the old checkpoint before updating the job queue to reflect the new checkpoint information. This leaves a window where if a problem occurs, we could be stuck with a job ad referring to the old deleted checkpoint. Dan's patch ensures that the job queue is updated before deleting the old checkpoint, to prevent this issue.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (12).
